snippet: It was the first public acknowledgment by the Saudis that they have ground troops in Yemen, where they are leading a coalition to roll back gains by Shiite rebels.
abstract: Death toll from rebel-led missile strike in Marib Province, Yemen rises to 60 after Saudi Arabian military reports 10 Saudi soldiers were among those killed; announcement confirms that Saudi troops are on the ground fighting Houthi in Yemen.
lead_paragraph: It was the first public acknowledgment by the Saudis that they have ground troops in Yemen, where they are leading a coalition to roll back gains by Shiite rebels.

headline.main: Saudi Officials Say 10 Soldiers Slain in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Saudi Officials Say 10 Soldiers Slain in Yemen
